trans-unit.source: Describes the location of the binding source relative to the position of the binding target.
trans-unit.target: 描述绑定源相对于绑定目标位置的位置。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文本使用对于[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]信息，请参阅[RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Refers to the ancestor in the parent chain of the data-bound element.
trans-unit.target: 引用数据绑定元素的父链中的上级。

trans-unit.source: You can use this to bind to an ancestor of a specific type or its subclasses.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用这绑定到的特定类型或其子类上级。

trans-unit.source: This is the mode you use if you want to specify <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorType*> and/or <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorLevel*>.
trans-unit.target: 这是如果你想要指定，则使用的模式<> *1> 和/或<> *1>。

trans-unit.source: Allows you to bind the previous data item (not that control that contains the data item) in the list of data items being displayed.
trans-unit.target: 在列表中显示的数据项，可将绑定上一个数据项 （不包含数据项的控件）。

trans-unit.source: Refers to the element on which you are setting the binding and allows you to bind one property of that element to another property on the same element.
trans-unit.target: 引用正在其设置绑定的元素，并允许您将该元素的一个属性绑定到在同一元素上的另一个属性。

trans-unit.source: Refers to the element to which the template (in which the data-bound element exists) is applied.
trans-unit.target: 引用 （在其中的数据绑定元素存在） 的模板应用到的元素。

trans-unit.source: This is similar to setting a <xref href="System.Windows.TemplateBindingExtension"></xref> and is only applicable if the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding"></xref> is within a template.
trans-unit.target: 它类似于设置<xref href="System.Windows.TemplateBindingExtension"></xref>且仅适用如果<xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding"></xref>位于模板内部。
